snippet.title: How bad was it? The Stomping Land - Awful Steam Games
snippet.description:
Let's go back to a time of optimisim.  A time when Kickstarter game titles were taken much more seriously without hesitation.  A time when the steam Early Access train wasn't quite seen for the cancer it is today.  Let's go take a look at some of the shittier games I've managed to buy over the years. I'd like to start with The Stomping Land.

The stomping land was a kickstarter project that first poped up in 2013, similar in concept to ARK (though before ARK was ever heard of!) Which has now been removed from steam.

I'd like to continue reviewing games, don't forget to leave some feedback.


You're free to use this song and monetize your video, but you must include the following in your video description:

Artist: http://incompetech.com/
